title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
Delight their senses with a curated collection of 16 luxurious aromatherapy candles, each in a charming 2.5oz portable tin. Hand-poured with natural soy wax and infused with premium essential oils, this set delivers clean, long-lasting fragrance—18–20 hours per candle—perfect for creating cozy moments anywhere.

Why they’ll love it:
- 16 exquisite scents to match every mood: Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Bluebell, Wood Sage & Sea Salt, Peony Cherry Blossom, and English Pear & Freesia.
- Clean burn, better air: Natural soy wax and essential oils for a soot-free, richly scented experience.
- Travel-friendly tins: Beautiful, portable, and ready for gifting—ideal for getaways, self-care nights, or setting the tone for any room.
- Thoughtful and versatile gift: Perfect for Mother, Wife, Daughter, or Friend—for birthdays, holidays, thank-yous, or “just because.”
- Earth-friendly design: Recyclable tin containers that can be repurposed as mini flowerpots or stylish home decor.

Give the gift of calm, comfort, and a beautifully fragranced home—16 times over. Note: Always keep candles out of the reach of children and pets when unattended to prevent accidents and fire.
